Articles.Content:
Alright guys, I have two Duna bases set up however to travel between them is a pain. So I had an idea what about a parasail trike!?

I have a basis of the craft but I can't get it to lift off on the surface of the red planet :/ please help guys!

http://www.americanparagliding.com/images/flashtrike_big.jpg
Also longevity is a must for the craft
With the way parachutes work in the game, this won't work due to the fact that on ascent the parachutes would hang below you.
Make it a solid winged ultralight with a firespitter electric pusher fan or prop.
If someone could put a craft file and I don't believe an engine like that would be enough power
